originalText.text: Dr. Roye and his team at NY Presbyterian are incredibly professional, personable and highly knowledgeable on their expertise. My daughter had a wonderful experience and received incredible care from all the staff. Dr. Roye will be highly recommended. We couldn’t have chosen a better pediatric orthopedic surgeon.

originalText.text: Dr Benjamin Roye is the best there is. He is very sensitive to the nature of each individual. He has helped my child to be able to live a wonderful and athletic life. Thank you so much Dr Benjamin Roye

text.text: Dr Benjamin Roye is the best there is. He is very sensitive to the nature of each individual. He has helped my child to be able to live a wonderful and athletic life. Thank you so much Dr Benjamin Roye

originalText.text: My 17 year old daughter had spinal fusion surgery last year done by Dr. Roye. He was amazing explained everything every step of the way before and after surgery. My daughter’s recovery was a little tough  at times but my daughter would not change a thing. We are so blessed to have met him and could not be more happy with her results. I highly recommend Dr. Roye.

text.text: My 17 year old daughter had spinal fusion surgery last year done by Dr. Roye. He was amazing explained everything every step of the way before and after surgery. My daughter’s recovery was a little tough  at times but my daughter would not change a thing. We are so blessed to have met him and could not be more happy with her results. I highly recommend Dr. Roye.

originalText.text: My 5 year old broke her leg. Dr Roye was amazing. I understood everything that was happening and everything to expect with her surgery and recovery. He explained it himself, members of his team also took the time to make sure we didn’t have any questions. This was a stressful and emotional time for my family and I appreciate Dr. Roye and his team!

originalText.text: Dr. Roye was wonderful. He was personable, communicated clearly, and was very caring. He also did a fantastic job. My child's surgery went smoothly, and she is recovering well. I highly recommend Dr. Roye and his staff without any reservations.
